chunk:
Fourth Ray Beauty BFD Cleansing Oil (2018 formulation)

Brand: Fourth Ray Beauty

Category: Facial Cleanser
book: 2710-Fourth Ray Beauty BFD Cleansing Oil (2018 formulation)

chunk: Ingredients: Caprylic/Capric Triglyceride, Peg-20 Glyceryl Triisostearate, Helianthus Annuus (Sunflower) Seed Oil, Hydrogenated Polyisobutene, Carthamus Tinctorius (Safflower) Seed Oil, Camellia Oleifera Seed Oil, Juniperus Communis Berry Oil, Limnanthes Alba (Meadowfoam) Seed Oil, Vitis Vinifera (Grape) Seed Oil, Quartz
book: 2710-Fourth Ray Beauty BFD Cleansing Oil (2018 formulation)

chunk:
Directions: Apply directly to dry skin & massage thoroughly over face, then add water to emulsify product & continue to massage off makeup and debris. Rinse with warm water.

Ingredient concerns: LOW: Cancer, Allergies & Immunotoxicity, Developmental and Reproductive Toxicity, Use Restrictions
book: 2710-Fourth Ray Beauty BFD Cleansing Oil (2018 formulation)
